A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 'The Force Awakens' was better\, but by no means perfect. 'The Last Jedi'\, although a failure as a 'Star Wars' movie\, also fails as an entertaining piece of cinema. I was bored for a large part of the movie. And too many characters were scene filling non-entities that didn't develop beyond what has already been established. Passable\, only by the skin of its teeth.
